<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Clinging Shadows Stance](/Spells.aspx?ID=2061)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=693" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=701" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 257 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until you leave the stance
</row>

</column>

---

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 void damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=619), [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) traits. While in clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), and to the DC for creatures to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) from you.
name: Clinging Shadows Stance
